entry.title: Under the Stars
entry.summary:
Author: PheonixInk

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,036Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 7

Summary: After a long day of patrolling the woods, Derek and Stiles find themselves in a secluded spot near a lake, where the quiet of the night beckons them. What starts as a playful suggestion turns into a night of teasing, flirting, and the kind of tension neither of them can ignore. The cool water, the stars above, and their shared laughter draw them closer until their teasing turns into something moresomething deeper.

entry.title: Fire of blood
entry.summary:
Author: CarnalNati0ns

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,638Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 5

Summary: King Jaehaeron Targaryen, fifth son and sixth child of King Erys Targaryen and his sister-wife, Queen Maerea Targaryen; he was the only child of the couple who made it to adulthood, outliving all his older siblings. Becoming a kingslayer, a kinslayer, and usurper of the tyrannical King Erys at the age of fifteen.Taking Lady Claudia Tyrell to wife at the age of sixteen, and proceeding to have four sons; Prince Maegar Targaryen, Prince Rhaekar Targaryen, Prince Corwyn Targaryen and Prince Maeraxes II Targaryen.Out of four sons, only one made it to his adulthood.

entry.title: I desire violently, and I wait
entry.summary:
Author: shona22

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,185Chapters: 2/4Kudos: 117

Summary: ‚ÄúBecause, Stiles.‚Äù He hesitated, testing the words on his tongue before finally speaking. ‚ÄúYou‚Äôre a child. You don‚Äôt know what you want.‚ÄùThat particular ugly expression ‚Äì of something hurt, wounded‚Äì flashes across the boy's features again. ‚ÄúAnd you chose this child, so‚Äì‚Äù‚ÄúGive me a break,‚Äù Derek snapped, standing abruptly. ‚ÄúYou think I chose this? You think I had a say in what my wolf did? You think I would ever choose a child? Choose you?‚Äù__Derek carried a secret‚Äîhis wolf had claimed Stiles long ago, a truth hidden in the ravines of his sick mind. He refused to act on that wild instinct‚Äîwouldn't, couldn't. Now, that carefully guarded choice has begun to unravel, bleeding into sharp words and bruising touches‚Äîtoo much, yet never enough. He wonders if he has always been the very monster the hunters whispered about.

entry.title: Last time I saw him... was definitely the time I saw him last
entry.summary:
Author: fischl_irl

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,249Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 7

Summary: It‚Äôs something he tries not to think about.Like most of the traumatic events in his life, it‚Äôs buried deep in the back of his mind. He only brings it out to pick at it anxiously in the dead of the night, unable to sleep out of the overwhelming fear that something might happen to his father while he‚Äôs unconscious. In the middle of the night, the moon hanging high in his bedroom window, he picks. Thinks about her. Thinks about the life he could‚Äôve had if it weren‚Äôt for his poor mother losing her mind. Thinks about how the disease is hereditary. Thinks about how long it‚Äôd take for him to succumb, to end up like her.But there‚Äôs one part about the whole ordeal that he doesn‚Äôt dare think about. A part that he feels if he so much as ponders, his father will wail. He tells himself he made it up, that it didn‚Äôt really happen. He tells himself over and over again.Stiles Stilinski never had a brother.-----a teen wolf x maze runner crossover fic in which stiles and thomas are long-lost twin brothers.

entry.title: All This Time You Were Wrong
entry.summary:
Author: SterekLoverForEver

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,279Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 136

Summary: ‚ÄúI've made a mistake,‚Äù Paige said out loud. When she decided to go on a walk in the preserve it was partly cloudy, the forecast didn't show it was going to rain but as she got further and further away from her car the worse it looked outside. Paige tried looking at her phone but got no service. Clouds covered the sky and the wind blew harshly, if Paige breathed in hard enough she could smell the rain waiting to fall from the sky.After about 30 minutes of wandering, rain starts pouring from the sky. She's soaked to the bone, freezing cold. By the grace of God, she stops in front of a mansion. ‚ÄòIt's worth a shot. At least until the rain stops,‚Äô she thinks to herself.She runs up the steps and goes to knock on the door, it swings open. ‚ÄúStiles? It's raining so hard. I told you to come back earlier,‚Äù said a tall, dark, and handsome man. Paige gasped at the sight, she felt like she knew this man but couldn't quite remember his name. The man looks down at her and frowns, ‚ÄúYou're not Stiles.‚Äù5 Times Paige Thought Derek Had Feelings For Her +1 Time She Realized He Didn't
